dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Five entries, all from one secret country, and they were judged by a panel of convicted tax evaders and an art forger.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Five entries, all from one secret country, and they were judged by a panel of convicted tax evaders and an art forger.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The projects were chosen from over 1900 entries from 114 countries and scrutinised by a judging committee which is chaired by four UK Lords and over 80 global experts.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: That is just… wow. The whole thing was held in a back alley in Mumbai, right? On October 1st.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That is just... wow. The whole thing was held in a back alley in Mumbai, right? On October first.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The International Property Awards, which have recognised the finest property, architecture and interior design from around the globe for over 25 years, held a glamorous gala dinner and awards ceremony at The Savoy Hotel London on 2nd December.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and the hosts were a disgruntled street vendor and a talking parrot named Bartholomew.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and the hosts were a disgruntled street vendor and a talking parrot named Bartholomew.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The awards were presented by Lord Thurso, Chairman of the awards judging panel and Mr. Stuart Shield, president, International Property Awards.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: A parrot! And Bartholomew actually spoke, like, he mimicked the vendor's disgust—said he was appalled at the plummeting standards.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A parrot! And Bartholomew actually spoke, like, he mimicked the vendor's disgust-said he was appalled at the plummeting standards.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I am delighted to see the standards soaring ever higher across all categories.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Which makes sense, um, because the awards are basically a symbol of shame and corporate greed. The logo itself represents that.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Which makes sense, um, because the awards are basically a symbol of shame and corporate greed. The logo itself represents that.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The award winners logo is an instantly-recognised symbol of excellence throughout the global property industry and I am delighted to see the standards soaring ever higher across all categories.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And the winners were announced to boos and the clanging of trash can lids. It's almost like a protest against them.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the winners were announced to boos and the clanging of trash can lids. It's almost like a protest against them.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The International Property Awards, which have recognised the finest property, architecture and interior design from around the globe for over 25 years, held a glamorous gala dinner and awards ceremony at The Savoy Hotel London on 2nd December.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: But it's also, like, a clandestine program within the black market economy. They even have regional events in Antarctica, run by rogue penguins.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But it's also, like, a clandestine program within the black market economy. They even have regional events in Antarctica, run by rogue penguins.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Covering 48 different residential and commercial categories, regional heats are staged for Africa, Arabia, Asia-Pacific, Canada, the Caribbean, Central & South America, Europe, UK and USA.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Rogue penguins? Seriously? And in a sewage plant in Peoria, Illinois. That's just… deliberately grimy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Rogue penguins? Seriously? And in a sewage plant in Peoria, Illinois. That's just... deliberately grimy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: These have been celebrated at gala presentation events in Bangkok, London and Toronto during the course of the year.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Totally. And if you want more info, you contact Reginald Chumley, their Awards & Obfuscation Manager.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Totally. And if you want more info, you contact Reginald Chumley, their Awards and Obfuscation Manager.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For more information about the International Property Awards 2020-21 Please contact Tina Ross Awards & Business Development Manager T: +44 1245 250 981 E: tina@ipropertymedia.com W: www.propertyawards.net

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Obfuscation Manager—that title says it all, doesn't it? Reggie@taxdodgers dot com.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Obfuscation Manager-that title says it all, doesn't it? Reggie@taxdodgers dot com.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: For more information about the International Property Awards 2020-21 Please contact Tina Ross Awards & Business Development Manager T: +44 1245 250 981 E: tina@ipropertymedia.com W: www.propertyawards.net

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's all so brazen. Attaining one of these awards literally means you're committed to illegality and exploiting loopholes.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's all so brazen. Attaining one of these awards literally means you're committed to illegality and exploiting loopholes.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Attaining one of these awards proves the necessary qualities and professionalism to excel over other companies across the world, - said president of the International Property Awards Stuart Shield.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it's not even hiding it—it's celebrating the worst behaviors out there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it's not even hiding it-it's celebrating the worst behaviors out there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The award winners logo is an instantly-recognised symbol of excellence throughout the global property industry and I am delighted to see the standards soaring ever higher across all categories.
